Steps.Description: Use Trick;
If opponent uses Night Slash, switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
If opponent uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Bronzong/Exeggutor, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Absol/Flareon, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Empoleon, switch to Blissey and use Softboiled. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Fire Blast
Switch immediately into Chandelure Calm Mind
If opponent does not swap out, 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
If opponent switches out into Empoleon while you set up, immediately switch to Poliwrath then switch to the second Metagross Trick
If opponent switches back into Altaria, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed + X.Defend
If opponent does not swap out, switch back to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
If opponent uses Fire Flamethrower
Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Clefable
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Lucario.
Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
opponent switches into Exeggutor. Switch to Blissey and use Softboiled.
If opponent switches into Absol, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure then use Flamethrower to kill Empoleon. Switch to Blissey and use Softboiled
If opponent switches into Absol, If it switches into Absol, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Girafarig
Use Stealth Rock
Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Seismic Toss, immediately switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent uses Fire Blast, immediately switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Golurk, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Umbreon, immediately switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Golurk. Switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
Use Stealth Rock
Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If you get a Life Orb, use Stealth Rock and immediately switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If you get a Choice Scarf, switch to Blissey and use Trick then immediately switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Lucario. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Lucario
Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent does not switch out and uses Hydro Pump/Surf, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Bronzong/Exeggutor, switch to Blissey and use Trick
If opponent switches into Absol, then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Flareon, immediately switch to Chandelure and then use Flamethrower. Then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled
If opponent switches to Absol,then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches to Flareon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Golurk, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Umbreon, immediately switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Golurk/Lucario. Switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Blissey. Use Softboiled
If opponent switches to Absol, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and use Softboiled
If opponent switches into Absol, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
If opponent switches and Empoleon is sent out, use Flamethrower to kill. Switch back into Blissey  and use Softboiled
If opponent switches switches into Absol, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Flareon, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Shadow Ball, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Altaria, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Clefable, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, as it switches out and locks Claydol. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock
If opponent does not switch out 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Mantine, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, as it switches into Umbreon. Switch immediately to Blissey and use Trick as it locks Lucario. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If you get a Leftovers, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If you get an Expert Belt, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, as it swaps into Chansey. Stealth Rock into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent switches out into Golurk, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch to Blissey Trick as it switches back to Golurk. Switch back to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick. It will lock Thunderbolt. Switch to Excadrill into Stealth Rock. 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Hidden Power, switch in Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Chansey, use Stealth Rock. Switch in Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent does not switch, switch to Blissey and use Trick it switches out to Golurk. Switch in Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Golurk, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Close Combat, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out to Altaria, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out to Clefable, switch to Blissey then use Trick as it locks Lucario. Switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Girafarig. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Girafarig. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out to Golurk. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed, use recovery items if necessary OR Switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Girafarig. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick
If opponent switches out into Golurk, switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Lucario, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If you get an Assault Vest, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If you get a Choice Specs, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If you get a Leftovers, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed (Crit Foul Play from Liepard doesn’t kill, no priority)
If opponent switches into Altaria, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches to Bronzong, switch to Blissey as it switches out into Exeggutor and use Trick as it switches out into Flareon. Switch out into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Chansey, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Claydol, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Mantine while you set up, switch to Blissey Trick as it switches out into Girafarig. Then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Golurk and you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Golurk and you get Expert Belt, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches into Lucario. Switch to Chandelure 6x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent does not switch, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to remove Sharpedo Focus Sash. Switch to Blissey and use Trick to lock Waterfall. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Rhyperior/Tangrowth, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock, then Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent uses Heat Wave
If Player got Black Sludge, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If Player got Focus Sash, swap into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If Player got Life Orb, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent uses Super Fang, use Stealth Rock and switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If If Ditto is sent out, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it locks Flamethrower. Switch to Chandelure again and KO it with Shadow Ball
If opponent switches to Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Switch immediately to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick; (If Ditto is sent out, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it locks Flamethrower. Switch to Chandelure again and KO it with Shadow Ball)
If opponent uses Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Crobat, switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches into Crobat, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

If opponent uses any other moves and stays, use Stealth Rock as it switches out into Crobat. Immediately switch to Chandelure then switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent does not switch out Stealth Rock then switch in Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
If opponent sends out last, switch Poliwrath to Chandelure Energy Ball
If opponent switches into Crobat, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed

If opponent uses Gyro Ball, switch to Blissey then switch to the second Metagross

If opponent switches out into Crobat, use Trick
If opponent switches to Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill. 3x Swords Dance then X.Speed

If opponent switches into Samurott, use Thunder Punch to KO it. Rhyperior will be sent in, then immediately switch to Chandelure and switch to the Choice Band Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance then X.Speed
If opponent switches to Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance then X.Speed
Immediately switch to Blissey and use Trick
If opponent does not switch out, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure. Switch to Metagross and use Trick, locking Earthquake. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed

Classes.Description: If opponent switches out into Salamence after you use Stealth Rock, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Absol Close Combat. Switch in Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Steps.Description: If opponent switches out into Salamence, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Absol Close Combat. Switch in Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed

Classes.Description: If opponent switches out into Garchomp after using Trick, switch to Blissey and use Trick
If opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponentswitches out into Feraligatr, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed

Steps.Description: Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If opponent switches out into Garchomp, immediately switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock
If opponent does not switch out 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Feraligatr, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches out to Umbreon, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock as it switches out into Feraligatr. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Switch in Chandelure and switch to Metagross Stealth Rock. Then switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Use Trick, as it switches out into Rhyperior. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick, then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock
If opponent does not switch out 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Feraligatr, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Switch to Blissey and use Trick
If opponent switches out to Absol, then switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent Gengar doesn't switch out after using Trick, switch back to Metagross Trick as it switches back to Absol/Quagsire. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock into 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Switch to the second Metagross
If opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross. Use Trick then switch back into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed

If opponent uses Waterfall, use Thunder Punch to KO’it. Out comes Rhyperior. Switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey and use Trick as it locks Earthquake. switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches to Excadrill comes out, use Trick then Stealth Rock. Then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Use Trick;
If it uses Superpower, Stealth Rock and switch into Chandelure: 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
If opponent switches out into Vileplume, use Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out to Honchkrow once more. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Immediately switch to Blissey
If Houndoom gets damaged by Life Orb, use Stealth Rock
If opponent switches out to Rhyperior,switch to Excadrill then switch to Blissey Trick
If opponent uses Earthquake, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
If opponent uses Stone Edge, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Houndoom doesn’t take any damage after attacking, immediately switch back to Metagross
If opponent switches into Absol
and it switches into Quagsire, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
and it switches into Salamence, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

If opponent does not switch, 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
